snippet: Sheriff Victor Hill of Clayton County vowed to continue on the job, a day after he was charged with reckless conduct in the shooting of a real estate agent that he called a “tragic accident.”
abstract: Sheriff Victor Hill of Clayton County, Ga, announces that he will continue in his office one day after he was charged with reckless conduct in shooting of real estate agent Gwenevere McCord.
lead_paragraph: Sheriff Victor Hill of Clayton County vowed to continue on the job, a day after he was charged with reckless conduct in the shooting of a real estate agent that he called a “tragic accident.”

headline.main: Georgia: Sheriff Accused of Shooting Stays on Job
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Sheriff Accused of Shooting Stays on Job
